We need your help, please!

{@LinkCreature:21#22#Crag Stalker reapers}, {@LinkCreature:21#23#Crag Stalker Skullcrushers}, {@LinkCreature:21#27#Crag Stalker Watchers}, and {@LinkCreature:21#6#Crag Stalker Champions} stole the holy statues we've worked so hard to acquire and ran into the desert west of here.

We've already paid dearly for those, we can't let them go. Please, chase the kulkari down and recover those statues!

What a relief! And they're not even damaged? Brilliant!

Please accept this reward and my effusive thanks.
We must have those statues, <PCNAME>! They're key to unlocking the secrets of the ruins!
